taskDescription:
Update all pricing information in the website based on new pricing structure:

- Color Analysis: $200 (was $175)
- One-Event Styling: $250 (unchanged)
- The Closet Edit: $395 (was $350)
- Personal Shopping: $150/hour (3-hour minimum = $450+)
- Wardrobe Overhaul: $1,200 (unchanged)
- Style Starter Bundle: $450 (was $450 with different savings)
- Complete Confidence Bundle: $1,300 (was $1,250)

Add "30 days of email support with a guaranteed 48-hour response time included with all packages" notice.

Files to update:
- services.html (main pricing page)
- index.html (schema priceRange)

features.description: Update services.html with new individual service prices (Color Analysis $200, Closet Edit $395)
Update services.html bundle pricing (Style Starter $450, Complete Confidence $1,300)
Update services.html to add email support notice (30 days, 48-hour response)
Update index.html schema priceRange from '$175-$1,200' to '$200-$1,200'
